content: tyler s cabled vest tyler s cabled vest was knit in plymouth yarn s galway worsted weight yarn color #179 a goldenrod yellow the vest is made up of 2 pieces a back panel and a tummy panel when the panels are sewn together openings are left for the front legs tyler my 9 ½ pound schnauzer is modeling the vest in small tyler s chest measurement is 16 ½ inches instructions are provided for size small and medium in parenthesis materials  1 2 skeins plymouth yarn galway  needles- size 8 5mm straight or circular or size needed to obtain gauge  cable needle  yarn needle for finishing sizing small chest measurement of 14-17 inches vest back length 10 inches medium chest measurements of 17-22 inches vest back length 12 ½ inches gauge 19 stitches sts and 25 row to 4 inches over stockinette stitch st st glossary  6 stitch left cross lc cable slip 3 sts to cable needle and hold in front of work k3 then 3 from cable needle  ssk slip slip knit slip next two sts one at a time knitwise to right needle insert left needle into front legs of those sts and knit them together  k2tog p2tog knit or purl 2 sts together pattern back cast on 55 73 sts beginning with p1 work in k1 p1 rib for 9 row or 1 ½ inches next row rs k1 p1 2 4 times and then increase 15 19 sts evenly across the row to the remaining 4 8 sts p1 k1 2 4 times 70 92 sts next row ws cable set up row p1 k1 2 4 times p6 k1 8 10 times p6 k1 p1 2 4 times begin cable pattern row 1and 2 knit sts as presented knit the knit sts and purl the purl sts row 3 rs k1 p1 2 4 times lc p1 8 10 times lc p1 k1 2 4 times row 4 5 and 6 knit sts as presented row 7 rs k1 p1 2 4 times k6 p1 lc p1 4 5 times k6 p1 k1 2 4 times row 8 9 and 10 knit sts as presented repeat row 3 through 10 5 7 times repeat row 3 4 and 5 once more next row ws p1 k1 2 4 times then using p2tog decrease 15 19 sts evenly across the middle 62 76 sts k1 p1 2 4 times 55 73 sts next row rs work in k1 p1 rib for 9 row or 1 ½ inches bind off all sts in rib pattern tummy panel cast on 25 31 sts beginning with p1 work in k1 p1 rib for 9 row or 1 ½ inches row 10 rs k1 p1 2 4 times k to last 4 8 sts p1 k1 2 4 times row 11 ws p1 k1 2 4 times p to last 4 8 sts k1 p1 2 4 times repeat last 2
